item.title: John Denver - Take Me Home, Country Roads
item.description:
+++++++ Tutorial to match this video here - https://youtu.be/5-2_ej_awEE +++++++
Ukulele play along
Take Me Home Country Roads - John Denver
Using the chords: A D E7 F#m G
Suggested Strum Pattern: D DU U DU
Website: http://ukulele.wales/ Ukulele Wales Channel: http://www.youtube.com/c/UkuleleWales T-Shirts & Merch: https:https://www.redbubble.com/people/ukulaliens/shop
This video is meant for educational purposes.
No copyright infringement intended

item.title: John Denver - Take Me Home, Country Roads - Key of G
John Denver - Leaving on a Jet Plane - Key of G
item.description: G, D, C, Am Strum pattern...try this: D- DU -U DU
